meanings.definition: A person who holds a position of supreme power or authority.
meanings.sent1: The supremos of the company made the final decision.
meanings.sent2: The board appointed a new supremos to lead the team.
meanings.sent3: The office party was a success thanks to the supremos organizing it.
meanings.sent4: In the world of superheroes, the supremos are the ones with extraordinary powers.
meanings.sent5: The supremos' presence commanded respect and admiration from everyone.

meanings.definition: The highest-ranking person in a particular group or organization.
meanings.sent1: As the supremos of the club, she had the authority to make important decisions.
meanings.sent2: The supremos of the school announced a new policy for the students.
meanings.sent3: The supremos of the chess club always wore a crown during matches for fun.
meanings.sent4: The supremos of the team was like a captain steering the ship to victory.
meanings.sent5: Everyone looked up to the supremos for guidance and leadership.
